statements: SELECT * FROM monthly_reports ORDER BY month DESC;
SELECT report_id, total_transactions FROM monthly_reports WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT month, total_amount FROM monthly_reports WHERE total_transactions < 50 ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM monthly_reports WHERE month >= '2022-01-01' AND month <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT SUM(total_amount) AS total_sum FROM monthly_reports;
SELECT * FROM monthly_reports WHERE total_transactions > 100 ORDER BY month DESC;
SELECT report_id, total_amount FROM monthly_reports WHERE month BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT AVG(total_amount) AS avg_amount, MAX(total_transactions) AS max_transactions FROM monthly_reports GROUP BY month;
SELECT * FROM monthly_reports ORDER BY total_amount DESC, total_transactions ASC LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT month, COUNT(*) AS num_reports FROM monthly_reports GROUP BY month HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM monthly_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM monthly_reports WHERE total_transactions > 100;
SELECT report_date, total_transactions FROM monthly_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_trends WHERE amount >= 1000;
SELECT trend_id, transaction_type, amount, trend_date FROM payment_trends ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM monthly_reports WHERE total_transactions > 100 ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT report_date, SUM(total_transactions) AS total FROM monthly_reports GROUP BY report_date HAVING total > 500 ORDER BY total DESC;

SELECT report_id, report_date, SUM(total_transactions) AS total_transactions FROM monthly_reports GROUP BY report_id, report_date HAVING total_transactions > 200 ORDER BY report_id ASC, report_date DESC;
SELECT trend_date, transaction_type, amount FROM payment_trends WHERE amount BETWEEN 100.00 AND 500.00 ORDER BY trend_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT trend_id, transaction_type, amount, trend_date FROM payment_trends WHERE trend_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7, 9) ORDER BY trend_id ASC, trend_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM monthly_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, total_amount FROM monthly_reports WHERE num_transactions > 100;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM p2p_transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM monthly_reports JOIN p2p_transactions ON monthly_reports.report_id = p2p_transactions.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM monthly_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_id, total_amount FROM monthly_reports WHERE num_transactions > 10 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM p2p_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;

SELECT report_date, total_amount, num_transactions FROM monthly_reports INNER JOIN p2p_transactions ON monthly_reports.report_date = p2p_transactions.transaction_date ORDER BY report_date DESC, total_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM monthly_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM monthly_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM p2p_payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT sender_name, sender_email FROM payment_senders WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT receiver_name, receiver_email FROM payment_receivers WHERE receiver_id <> 2;
SELECT * FROM monthly_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM monthly_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;

SELECT sender_name, receiver_name, amount FROM p2p_payments JOIN payment_senders ON p2p_payments.sender_id = payment_senders.sender_id JOIN payment_receivers ON p2p_payments.receiver_id = payment_receivers.receiver_id;
SELECT * FROM monthly_reports WHERE report_name LIKE 'Quarterly%';
SELECT sender_name, receiver_name, amount FROM p2p_payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM MonthlyReports;
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM MonthlyReports WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_date FROM Transactions WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT method_id, method_name FROM PaymentMethods WHERE method_name LIKE '%card%';
SELECT * FROM Users ORDER BY registration_date DESC, user_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, payment_id, user_id FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;

SELECT Users.username, MonthlyReports.amount, Transactions.transaction_date FROM Users JOIN Transactions ON Users.user_id = Transactions.user_id JOIN MonthlyReports ON Transactions.payment_id = MonthlyReports.payment_id WHERE Users.username LIKE 'A%' AND MonthlyReports.amount > 1000;

SELECT Users.email, PaymentMethods.method_name, PaymentDetails.amount FROM Users JOIN Transactions ON Users.user_id = Transactions.user_id JOIN MonthlyReports ON Transactions.payment_id = MonthlyReports.payment_id JOIN PaymentDetails ON MonthlyReports.payment_id = PaymentDetails.payment_id JOIN PaymentMethods ON PaymentDetails.method_id = PaymentMethods.method_id ORDER BY PaymentDetails.amount DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT Users.username, Transactions.payment_id, PaymentMethods.method_name FROM Users JOIN Transactions ON Users.user_id = Transactions.user_id JOIN PaymentDetails ON Transactions.payment_id = PaymentDetails.payment_id JOIN PaymentMethods ON PaymentDetails.method_id = PaymentMethods.method_id WHERE PaymentMethods.method_name IN ('PayPal', 'Credit Card');
